title: Successful login redirects user to dashboard
description: Verifies a user can log in with valid credentials and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Click the Login button to submit

title: Invalid password shows an invalid-credentials error message
description: Verifies the login page displays a clear error when password is incorrect.

steps.description: Click the Login button to submit

title: Non-existent user shows an invalid-credentials error message
description: Verifies the login page displays an error when the account does not exist.

steps.description: Click the Login button to submit

title: Submitting with empty email shows validation or required-field message
description: Verifies the login form prevents submission (or shows a clear message) when email is missing.

steps.description: Click the Login button to submit

title: Submitting with empty password shows validation or required-field message
description: Verifies the login form prevents submission (or shows a clear message) when password is missing.

steps.description: Click the Login button to submit

title: Login via keyboard Enter submits and redirects to dashboard
description: Verifies the user can submit the login form using the Enter key and reach the dashboard on success.

title: Leading/trailing spaces in email are handled correctly during login
description: Verifies email input with surrounding spaces still allows successful authentication (or surfaces a clear error if not supported).

steps.description: Click the Login button to submit

title: Register a new user successfully and land on Dashboard
description: Verifies a user can submit the registration form with valid details and is taken to the dashboard.

steps.description: Type "Test User" into the name field

title: Registration fails when email is already registered
description: Verifies the server error is surfaced when attempting to register with an existing email.

steps.description: Type "Existing User" into the name field

title: Registration validation: missing name shows an error and blocks submission
description: Verifies the UI prevents registration when the name field is empty.

title: Registration validation: missing email shows an error and blocks submission
description: Verifies the UI prevents registration when the email field is empty.

steps.description: Type "No Email" into the name field

title: Registration validation: invalid email format is rejected
description: Verifies the registration form rejects an invalid email format and stays on the registration page.

steps.description: Type "Invalid Email" into the name field

title: Registration validation: missing password shows an error and blocks submission
description: Verifies the UI prevents registration when the password field is empty.

steps.description: Type "No Password" into the name field

title: Registration validation: too-short password is rejected
description: Verifies a weak/too-short password results in a visible error and does not navigate away.

steps.description: Type "Weak Password" into the name field

title: Registration navigation: login link is available from registration page
description: Verifies users can navigate from the registration page to the login page using the on-page link.

title: Request password reset with a valid email shows generic success message
description: Verifies submitting a well-formed email displays the non-enumerating success message.

steps.description: Verify text "If an account exists, we've sent a link to your email" is visible

title: Invalid email format shows validation error and does not show success message
description: Verifies client-side/server-side validation blocks submission for malformed email input.

steps.description: Verify text "If an account exists, we've sent a link to your email" is not visible

title: Unknown email still shows generic success message (no account enumeration)
description: Verifies the page does not reveal whether an email is registered.

steps.description: Verify text "If an account exists, we've sent a link to your email" is visible
Verify text "No account" is not visible

title: Empty email submission shows required field validation
description: Verifies the form prevents submission when the email field is blank.

steps.description: Verify text "Email is required" is visible
Verify text "If an account exists, we've sent a link to your email" is not visible

title: Email with leading/trailing spaces is accepted and results in generic success message
description: Verifies common user input (whitespace around email) still allows request and shows generic success.

steps.description: Type "  user@example.com  " into the email field
Verify text "If an account exists, we've sent a link to your email" is visible
Verify text "Invalid email" is not visible

title: User can reach Forgot Password from Login page
description: Verifies navigation to the Forgot Password page from Login is available and lands on the correct screen.

title: Start guided tour from /demo and verify first step is shown
description: Verifies the demo banner, value callouts, and that starting the tour displays the first guided step.

title: Guided tour progresses to a relationships step and tooltip appears on first relationship card
description: Verifies clicking Next advances the tour and a contextual tooltip is visible on the Relationships page.

title: Guided tour progresses to Matches and shows blind matching tooltip
description: Verifies the tour continues through to the Matches page and displays the blind matching tooltip on the first match card.

title: Guided tour reaches Deal Rooms, opens first deal room, and shows overview highlight
description: Verifies the tour can reach Deal Rooms, open a deal room from the list, and display a tour highlight/step in the Deal Room view.

steps.description: Click on the first deal room in the list

title: Restart Tour restarts the guided tour from the first step
description: Verifies the Restart Tour control is available and returns the user to the first tour step.

title: Dismiss a sales/value callout in the demo banner
description: Verifies sales/value callouts are dismissible and disappear after dismissal.

title: Tour fallback when a target element is missing shows Skip and Restart options
description: Verifies that when the guided tour cannot find a DOM target, the UI presents fallback options to skip or restart the tour.

title: Skip Tour ends the guided tour overlay
description: Verifies the Skip Tour action dismisses/ends the tour overlay and returns the user to normal page content.

title: Dashboard renders key metric cards and greeting
description: Verifies the dashboard loads and shows key visible dashboard content such as greeting and metric cards/stats.

title: Navigate from Dashboard Trust Score card to Verification page
description: Verifies clicking the Trust Score card routes the user to the Verification page.

title: Dashboard sidebar navigation to Relationships
description: Verifies the user can navigate away from the dashboard using the sidebar navigation.

steps.description: Click on "Relationships" in the sidebar menu

title: Open Deal Rooms list and verify list content is visible
description: Verifies the Deal Rooms list page loads and shows a visible list of deal rooms.

steps.description: Verify at least one deal room card is visible

title: Open a deal room from the list and verify the Overview tab content
description: Verifies a user can open a deal room detail page and see Overview content by default.

steps.description: Click the first visible deal room card

title: Switch to Documents tab and verify documents list is shown
description: Verifies tab transition from Overview to Documents and that a documents list area is visible.

steps.description: Click the first visible deal room card
Verify a documents list or empty-state section is visible

title: Switch to Diligence tab and verify diligence content is visible
description: Verifies tab transition to Diligence and that the diligence section renders visible content.

steps.description: Click the first visible deal room card
Verify a diligence content section is visible

title: Return from Documents tab to Overview tab and verify Overview content still renders
description: Verifies tab transitions are stable when switching back and forth within a deal room.

steps.description: Click the first visible deal room card

title: Deal Rooms list: verify search input accepts text and list area remains visible
description: Verifies the list page search field is usable and the list container remains visible after input.

steps.description: Verify the deal rooms list area is visible
Verify at least one deal room card is visible

title: Filter relationships list using search input
description: Verifies that the relationships list can be filtered using the search field and results update on-screen.

title: Add a new relationship from the Relationships page
description: Verifies a user can add a relationship via the Add Relationship flow and see it appear in the list.

steps.description: Type "Test Relationship A" into the "Name" field
Verify text "Test Relationship A" is visible

title: Cancel adding a relationship does not create a new list item
description: Verifies cancelling out of the Add Relationship dialog does not add a new relationship to the list.

steps.description: Type "Should Not Be Saved" into the "Name" field
Verify text "Should Not Be Saved" is not visible

title: Required field validation when saving a new relationship
description: Verifies required fields are enforced and the relationship is not saved when required inputs are missing.

title: Relationships list shows loading state before data appears
description: Verifies a visible loading skeleton/placeholder appears while the relationships list query is loading.

title: Empty state shown when no relationships are returned
description: Verifies the EmptyState is shown with next steps when the relationships list has no results.

title: Custody/hash tooltip content is discoverable from relationships list row
description: Verifies that custody/hash help text can be surfaced via tooltip from a relationship row.

title: View verification status and Trust Score panel renders successfully
description: Verifies the /verification page shows a verification status panel and the Trust Score section on initial view.

title: Tier badge is visible alongside Trust Score on first view
description: Verifies a tier badge is shown near the Trust Score section on initial page load.

steps.description: Verify element "Trust Score value" is visible

title: Verification status panel shows a clear status state (e.g., Verified / Pending / Unverified)
description: Verifies the verification status panel includes a clearly readable status indicator for the current entity/user.

title: Navigate from Dashboard to Matches via sidebar
description: Verifies a user can navigate from the Dashboard to the Matches page using the sidebar.

title: Open header user menu from Matches page
description: Verifies the header user menu can be opened from a typical internal page.

steps.description: Click the header user menu (profile/avatar button)

title: Intelligence sidebar item opens Coming Soon page
description: Verifies the Intelligence navigation opens a Coming Soon placeholder page.

title: Return to Dashboard from Intelligence Coming Soon page
description: Verifies the Coming Soon placeholder provides a working link back to the Dashboard.

title: User menu can be opened and closed from the header
description: Verifies the user menu toggles open and closed from the header control.

steps.description: Click the header user menu (profile/avatar button)
Verify element "User menu" is not visible

title: Sidebar navigation to Deal Rooms list
description: Verifies a user can navigate to Deal Rooms from the sidebar.

title: Sidebar navigation to Relationships page
description: Verifies a user can navigate to Relationships from the sidebar.

title: Sidebar navigation to Settings page
description: Verifies a user can navigate to Settings from the sidebar or header navigation entry (where available).

title: Accept a top match from Deal Matching and see success toast
description: Verifies a user can open a top match and accept it, receiving a visible success confirmation toast.

steps.description: Click the top match card in the matching results area

title: Decline a top match and see confirmation toast
description: Verifies a user can decline a top match and receives a visible decline confirmation.

steps.description: Click the top match card in the matching results area

title: Undo an Accept action from toast
description: Verifies the user can undo an acceptance using the undo action in the toast/feedback component.

steps.description: Click the top match card in the matching results area

title: Undo a Decline action from toast
description: Verifies the user can undo a decline using the undo action in the toast/feedback component.

steps.description: Click the top match card in the matching results area

title: Open top match and view match detail panel/review view
description: Verifies clicking a top match card opens a match detail panel or review view with key match information visible.

steps.description: Click the top match card in the matching results area

title: Empty state shown when no matches are available
description: Verifies an empty state with guidance is shown when the matching list has no available matches.

steps.description: Verify text "Create an Intent" is visible

title: Empty state guidance navigates user to Intents page
description: Verifies the empty state call-to-action routes the user to the Intents page to create an intent.

steps.description: Verify text "Create an Intent" is visible

title: Accept action is not available until a match is opened
description: Verifies the user must first open a match card before the Accept action becomes available.

steps.description: Click the top match card in the matching results area

title: View audit log list on Audit Logs page
description: Verifies the Audit Logs page loads and displays an audit entries list.

steps.description: Verify element "audit entries list" is visible

title: Filter audit logs by event type using filter dropdown
description: Verifies selecting an event type filter updates the visible audit entries list.

steps.description: Verify element "audit entries list" is visible
Verify element "audit entries list" is visible

title: Clear or reset event type filter to return to unfiltered list
description: Verifies the user can reset the filter and return to the default list view.

steps.description: Verify element "audit entries list" is visible
